dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 2678 IH: To prohibit United States contributions to the United Nations Population Fund.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Salmon introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs

form.official-title: To prohibit United States contributions to the United Nations Population Fund.

section.header: Prohibition on United States contributions to the United Nations Population Fund
section.text: No funds available to the Department of State or any other department or agency may be used to provide contributions directly or indirectly to the United Nations Population Fund.
